verbs.description: [ARG0: Attorney General Jeff Sessions] [V: told] [ARG2: the White House] [ARGM-TMP: last weekend] [ARG1: that if President Donald Trump fires Deputy Attorney General Rod Rosenstein , Sessions himself may quit] .
Attorney General Jeff Sessions told the White House last weekend that if President Donald Trump fires Deputy Attorney General Rod Rosenstein , Sessions himself [V: may] quit .

Attorney General Jeff Sessions told the White House last weekend that [ARGM-ADV: if President Donald Trump fires Deputy Attorney General Rod Rosenstein] , [ARG0: Sessions himself] [ARGM-MOD: may] [V: quit] .
